name: Clotures Sentinelle
overview:
In 1983, Inter Clôtures Sentinelle began its operations on rue de la Station in Laval. During 2000, the company moved to 1800 Dagenais Bld. Ouest, in the Sainte-Rose district of Laval.

Inter Clôtures Sentinelle is a founding member of Groupe Inter Clôture, the largest organization of fencing professionals in Quebec, and has been since 1991.

A member of the Canadian Fence Industry Association and recognized by CAA Housing, Inter Clôtures Sentinelle has established itself as a leader within its industry.

The company offers a showroom and a parts counter. You can buy your fence in store to install it yourself or hire the expertise of our installation services.

We offer our customers a range of diverse and innovative products to meet every taste and every budget. We provide sales, repair and installation services whether for residential, commercial or industrial needs.
